mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TD_CUST_INFO( CUST_ID, CUST_NAME, TRADE_PWD, ATTACH_STR, CERTIFY_TYPE, CERTIFY_NO, CUST_TYPE, MERCHANT_FLAG, CUST_SCORE, CUST_LVL, TRUST_CERTIFY_LVL, INDUSTRY_BELONG, YEAR_TURNOVER, MERCHANT_WEB_SITE, STATE, IS_USE_CERTIFICATION, IS_USE_MSG, QFQ_ACC_ID, QFB_ACC_ID, CREATE_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, BUSINESS_TERM, BUSINESS_REG_ADDR, contact_name, contact_mobile, cnaps, COMP_MAIN_ACCT_TYPE, bank_province_name, bank_city_name, referrer, service_level, id_term_start, id_term_end ) VALUES( #{custId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradePwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certifyType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certifyNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantFlag, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{merchantWebSite, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUseCertification, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUseMsg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qfqAccId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qfbAccId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{modifyId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime, jdbcType=DATE}, date_format(#{businessTerm, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d'), #{businessRegAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgInstCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{representativeAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{representativeMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentCertType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentCertCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compMainAcct, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compAcctBank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compVerifyAmt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchBank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAcctName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcontactunitNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessTermStart, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessTermEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchRole, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custManager, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idTermStart, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idTermEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

CUST_TYPE,

#{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select count(1) from td_cust_info T where T.business_license = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and T.merchant_flag = '2'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM td_login_user_info t WHERE t.MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND t.ROLE_ID = 'ent'

select C.CUST_ID, C.CUST_NAME, C.TRADE_PWD, C.ATTACH_STR, C.CERTIFY_TYPE, C.CERTIFY_NO, C.CUST_TYPE, C.MERCHANT_FLAG, C.CUST_SCORE, C.CUST_LVL, C.TRUST_CERTIFY_LVL, C.TRUST_CERTIFY_AUDIT_STATE, C.CUST_INFO_LVL, C.CUST_ADD, C.CUST_POST_CODE, C.BUSINESS_LICENSE, C.TAX_REG_CERT, C.REPRESENTATIVE_CERT_TYPE, C.REPRESENTATIVE_CERT_NO, C.REPRESENTATIVE_NAME, C.REG_CAPITAL, C.ENT_TYPE, C.INDUSTRY_BELONG, C.YEAR_TURNOVER, C.MERCHANT_WEB_SITE, C.STATE, C.IS_USE_CERTIFICATION, C.IS_USE_MSG, C.QFQ_ACC_ID, C.QFB_ACC_ID, C.CREATE_ID, C.CREATE_TIME, C.MODIFY_ID, C.MODIFY_TIME, C.BUSINESS_TERM, C.BUSINESS_REG_ADDR, C.CONTACT_PHONE, C.ORG_INST_CODE, C.REPRESENTATIVE_ADDR, C.REPRESENTATIVE_MOBILE, C.AGENT_NAME, C.AGENT_CERT_TYPE, C.AGENT_CERT_CODE, C.AGENT_MOBILE, C.COMP_MAIN_ACCT, C.COMP_ACCT_BANK, C.COMP_VERIFY_AMT, C.BRANCH_BANK, C.BANK_ACCT_NAME, C.FCONTACTUNIT_NUMBER, C.MERCHANT_CODE, C.categoryType, C.mchRole, C.province, C.city, C.country, C.filing_status, C.filing_audit_status, C.IS_CLEAR, DATE_FORMAT(C.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, u.email, u.MOBILE, u.state merchantState from td_cust_info c inner join td_login_user_info u on c.cust_id = u.cust_id
c.merchant_flag = 2 and c.trust_certify_audit_state = 30
and c.merchant_code like CONCAT('%',#{merchantCode},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startCreateTime}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endCreateTime}
and u.email like CONCAT('%',#{email},'%')
and c.cust_name like CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%')
order by c.create_time desc

select c.*, u.email, u.MOBILE, u.state merchantState from td_cust_info c inner join td_login_user_info u on c.cust_id = u.cust_id where 1=1 and (EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT temp.cust_id FROM stcdb.bms_protocol_content temp WHERE temp.id IN ( SELECT bms.protocol_id FROM stcdb.bms_protocol_column bms WHERE (bms.column_value = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or bms.column_value = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND bms.column_code = 'custManager' ) ) TT WHERE TT.cust_id = C.CUST_ID ) OR EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM sys_user u WHERE u.user_id =c.CREATE_ID AND u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) and c.merchant_flag = 2 and c.trust_certify_audit_state = 30
and c.merchant_code like CONCAT('%',#{merchantCode},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startCreateTime}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endCreateTime}
and u.email like CONCAT('%',#{email},'%')
and c.cust_name like CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%')
order by c.create_time desc

SELECT c.`MERCHANT_CODE`, c.`CUST_NAME`, c.`CERTIFY_NO`, c.`CUST_TYPE`, c.`MERCHANT_FLAG`, c.`BUSINESS_LICENSE`, c.`STATE`, c.`QFQ_ACC_ID` qfqAccId, c.`CREATE_ID`, c.`CREATE_TIME`, c.`MODIFY_ID`, c.`MODIFY_TIME`, c.`REPRESENTATIVE_MOBILE`, c.`FCONTACTUNIT_NUMBER`, c.`COMP_MAIN_ACCT`, c.`COMP_ACCT_BANK`, c.`Bank_acct_name`, c.`Branch_BANK`, u.`EMAIL`, u.`STATE` merchantState FROM td_cust_info c INNER JOIN td_login_user_info u ON c.cust_id = u.cust_id
c.merchant_flag = 2 and c.trust_certify_audit_state = 30
and c.merchant_code like CONCAT('%',#{merchantCode},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startCreateTime}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endCreateTime}
and u.email like CONCAT('%',#{email},'%')
and c.cust_name like CONCAT('%',#{custName},'%')
order by c.create_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE TD_CUST_INFO U SET U.STATE='00' , U.TRUST_CERTIFY_LVL= 3 WHERE U.CUST_ID= #{custId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT C.*, C.MERCHANT_MOBILE agentMobile, IFNULL(U.EMAIL,U.MOBILE) EMAIL, U.MOBILE, F.FEE_CODE, T.AUTH_RESULT_DESC aduitMessage, S.USER_NAME aduitUserName, Y.USER_NAME createName, P.PROVINCE_NAME, Q.BANK_NAME bankName, B.city_name, M.area_name as areaName, P.PROVINCE_NAME provinceName, SP.PROVINCE_NAME bankProName, SC.CITY_NAME bankCitName, T.CERTIFY_DATETIME auditTime FROM TD_CUST_INFO C INNER JOIN TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO U ON C.CUST_ID=U.CUST_ID
JOIN TD_CERTIFICATE_AUTH T ON C.AUTH_ID = T.AUTH_ID left JOIN SYS_USER S ON S.USER_ID = T.CERTIFY_USER left JOIN SYS_USER Y ON Y.USER_ID = C.CREATE_ID LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_FEE_RULE F ON C.CUST_ID=F.CUST_ID left join tb_sp_province P ON P.PROVINCE_ID = C.province left join tb_sp_city B ON B.city_id = C.city left join tb_bank_code Q ON Q.BANK_TYPE = C.COMP_ACCT_BANK left join tb_sp_area M ON M.area_id = C.country left join tb_province SP ON SP.PROVINCE_ID = C.bank_province_name left join tb_city SC ON SC.city_id = C.bank_city_name WHERE c.CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT C.area_name FROM tb_sp_area C where C.area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TD_CUST_INFO
CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFY_TYPE = #{certifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFY_NO =#{certifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_REG_ADDR=#{businessRegAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TERM=#{businessTerm,jdbcType=DATE},
BUSINESS_TERM_START=#{businessTermStart,jdbcType=DATE},
BUSINESS_TERM_END=#{businessTermEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
CUST_ADD=#{custAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONTACTUNIT_NUMBER = #{fcontactunitNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE=#{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_INST_CODE=#{orgInstCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPRESENTATIVE_NAME=#{representativeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPRESENTATIVE_CERT_NO=#{representativeCertNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPRESENTATIVE_MOBILE=#{representativeMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_MAIN_ACCT=#{compMainAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_ACCT_BANK=#{compAcctBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_BANK=#{branchBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCT_NAME=#{bankAcctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QFQ_ACC_ID = #{qfqAccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_CODE = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ADD = #{custAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_MOBILE = #{agentMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
categoryType = #{categoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mchRole = #{mchRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CLEAR = #{isClear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merchant_email = #{merchantEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filing_audit_status = #{filingAuditStatus , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
STATE = #{merchantState , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
custManager = #{custManager , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
bank_province_name = #{bankProvinceName , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
bank_city_name = #{bankCityName , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
SHORT_NAME = #{shortName , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
contact_mobile = #{contactMobile , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
contact_name = #{contactName , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
filing_status = #{filingStatus , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
id_term_start = #{idTermStart , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
id_term_end = #{idTermEnd , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
COMP_MAIN_ACCT_TYPE = #{compMainAcctType , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
referrer = #{referrer , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
service_level = #{serviceLevel , jdbcType = VARCHAR}
WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE TD_CUST_INFO
CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFY_TYPE = #{certifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFY_NO =#{certifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_REG_ADDR=#{businessRegAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TERM=#{businessTerm,jdbcType=DATE},
BUSINESS_TERM_START=#{businessTermStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TERM_END=#{businessTermEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ADD=#{custAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONTACTUNIT_NUMBER = #{fcontactunitNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE=#{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_INST_CODE=#{orgInstCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPRESENTATIVE_NAME=#{representativeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPRESENTATIVE_CERT_NO=#{representativeCertNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPRESENTATIVE_MOBILE=#{representativeMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_MAIN_ACCT=#{compMainAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMP_ACCT_BANK=#{compAcctBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCH_BANK=#{branchBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCT_NAME=#{bankAcctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QFQ_ACC_ID = #{qfqAccId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_CODE = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ADD = #{custAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_MOBILE = #{agentMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
categoryType = #{categoryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mchRole = #{mchRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CLEAR = #{isClear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
filing_audit_status = #{filingAuditStatus , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
STATE = #{merchantState , jdbcType = VARCHAR},
merchant_email = #{merchantEmail , jdbcType = VARCHAR}
WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t.CUST_ID, t.CUST_NAME, t.MERCHANT_CODE FROM td_cust_info t LEFT JOIN td_login_user_info l ON t.CUST_ID = l.CUST_ID WHERE ( ( t.CUST_TYPE = '1' AND t.MERCHANT_FLAG = '0' AND l.STATE in ('00','01','05','06') ) OR ( t.MERCHANT_FLAG = '2' )OR ( t.MERCHANT_FLAG = '3' ) ) AND t.MERCHANT_CODE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC;

SELECT t.CUST_ID, t.CUST_NAME, t.MERCHANT_CODE FROM td_cust_info t LEFT JOIN td_login_user_info l ON t.CUST_ID = l.CUST_ID WHERE t.MERCHANT_FLAG = '3' AND t.MERCHANT_CODE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC;
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM td_cust_info WHERE merchant_code = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM td_cust_info t JOIN td_login_user_info l ON t.CUST_ID = l.CUST_ID WHERE t.MERCHANT_FLAG IN ('0', '2') AND l.STATE = '00' ORDER BY t.CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.update:
update td_login_user_info
ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_PWD = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
WRONG_PWD_COUNT = #{wrongPwdCount,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
IS_BAND_MOBILE_FOR_LOGIN = #{isBandMobileForLogin,jdbcType=CHAR},
ONLINE_STATE = #{onlineState,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ATTACH_STR = #{attachStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_TYPE = #{registerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_STR = #{registerStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_ID = #{modifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FREEZE_TIME = #{freezeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
imgHeadInfoId = #{imgheadinfoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, U.EMAIL, U.MOBILE, F.FEE_CODE FROM TD_CUST_INFO C INNER JOIN TD_LOGIN_USER_INFO U ON C.CUST_ID=U.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN TD_CUST_FEE_RULE F ON C.CUST_ID=F.CUST_ID WHERE c.CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TD_CUST_BELONG_INFO( MANAGER_ID, SERVICE_PARENTER_ID, SALESMAN_ID, CUST_ID, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME )VALUES( #{managerId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{servicePartnerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesmanId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modiftyTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
